languages.text: Once per combat, when Keykeross loses more than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, she attacks a creature and restores wounds equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} she dealt. If the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, Keykeross deals {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to the target equal to 50% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. If the target fails the test, Keykeross deals mental damage to the target equal to 90% of the target's maximum wounds, and the target gains the dirty trick {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}.
languages.original_text: Один раз за бой, когда у Кикеросс остается меньше 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, она совершает атаку и восстанавливает здоровье в объеме, равном нанесенному {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}. Цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае успеха получает от Кикеросс {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психический урон{/g}, равный 50% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}. При провале цель получает психический урон, равный 90% от своего максимального здоровья, а также {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативный эффект{/g} "запрещенный прием".

traits.locale_text: Once per combat, when Keykeross loses more than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, she attacks a creature and restores wounds equal to the damage she dealt. If the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, Keykeross deals mental damage to the target equal to 50% of the target's maximum wounds. If the target fails the test, Keykeross deals mental damage to the target equal to 90% of the target's maximum wounds, and the target gains the dirty trick {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effect{/g}.

Once per combat, when Keykeross loses more than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, she attacks a creature and restores wounds equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} she dealt. If the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, Keykeross deals {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to the target equal to 50% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. If the target fails the test, Keykeross deals mental damage to the target equal to 90% of the target's maximum wounds, and the target gains the dirty trick {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}.

If the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, Keykeross deals {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to the target equal to 50% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. If the target fails the test, Keykeross deals mental damage to the target equal to 90% of the target's maximum wounds, and the target gains the dirty trick {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}.

languages.text: Один раз за бой, когда у Кикеросс остается меньше 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, она совершает атаку и восстанавливает здоровье в объеме, равном нанесенному {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}. Цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае успеха получает от Кикеросс {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психический урон{/g}, равный 50% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}. При провале цель получает психический урон, равный 90% от своего максимального здоровья, а также {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативный эффект{/g} "запрещенный прием".

戦闘1回につき、キーケロスが50%以上の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を失ったとき、生物1匹を攻撃し、与えた{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}と等しい傷を回復する。ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格した場合、キーケロスはターゲットに最大の傷の50%に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}を与える。ターゲットが判定に失格した場合、キーケロスはターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}の90%に等しい精神的ダメージを与え、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}である汚い手段を得る。
languages.original_text: Once per combat, when Keykeross loses more than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, she attacks a creature and restores wounds equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} she dealt. If the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, Keykeross deals {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to the target equal to 50% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. If the target fails the test, Keykeross deals mental damage to the target equal to 90% of the target's maximum wounds, and the target gains the dirty trick {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}.

traits.locale_text: キーケロスが50％以上の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を失った時、戦闘1回につき生物1体を攻撃し、与えたダメージと等しい傷を回復する。ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}テスト{/g}に合格した場合、キーケロスはターゲットに最大の傷の50％に等しい精神的ダメージを与える。ターゲットがテストに失格した場合、キーケロスはターゲットに最大の傷の90％に等しい精神的ダメージを与え、ターゲットは汚い手段の{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}マイナス効果{/g}を得る。

戦闘1回につき、キーケロスが50%以上の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を失ったとき、生物1匹を攻撃し、与えた{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}と等しい傷を回復する。ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格した場合、キーケロスはターゲットに最大の傷の50%に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}を与える。ターゲットが判定に失格した場合、キーケロスはターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}の90%に等しい精神的ダメージを与え、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}である汚い手段を得る。

languages.text: 当绮克萝丝的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于50%时候，她会攻击一名生物，造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，并恢复同等数量的生命值。如果目标通过了{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，则绮克萝丝会对目标造成{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}，等同于目标{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的50%。如果目标未能通过检定，则绮克萝丝会对目标造成精神伤害，等同于目标最大生命值的90%，并对目标施加“肮脏伎俩”这一{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}。
languages.original_text: Once per combat, when Keykeross loses more than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, she attacks a creature and restores wounds equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} she dealt. If the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, Keykeross deals {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to the target equal to 50% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. If the target fails the test, Keykeross deals mental damage to the target equal to 90% of the target's maximum wounds, and the target gains the dirty trick {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当绮克萝丝的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于50%时候，她会攻击一名生物，并恢复同等数量的生命值。如果目标通过了{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，则绮克萝丝会对目标造成精神伤害，等同于目标最大生命值的50%。如果目标未能通过检定，则绮克萝丝会对目标造成精神伤害，等同于目标最大生命值的90%，并对目标施加“肮脏伎俩”这一{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}负面效果{/g}。

当绮克萝丝的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于50%时候，她会攻击一名生物，造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，并恢复同等数量的生命值。如果目标通过了{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，则绮克萝丝会对目标造成{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}，等同于目标{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的50%。如果目标未能通过检定，则绮克萝丝会对目标造成精神伤害，等同于目标最大生命值的90%，并对目标施加“肮脏伎俩”这一{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}。

languages.text: Una vez por combate, cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de Keykeross bajan del 50 %, ataca a una criatura y recupera heridas por valor del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} infligido. Si el objetivo supera una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, Keykeross le inflige {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g} igual al 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}. Si el objetivo falla la prueba, Keykeross le inflige daño mental igual al 90 % de sus heridas máximas y el objetivo sufre el {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efecto negativo{/g} truco sucio.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, when Keykeross loses more than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, she attacks a creature and restores wounds equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} she dealt. If the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, Keykeross deals {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to the target equal to 50% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. If the target fails the test, Keykeross deals mental damage to the target equal to 90% of the target's maximum wounds, and the target gains the dirty trick {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Una vez por combate, cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de Keykeross bajan del 50 %, ataca a una criatura y recupera heridas por valor del daño infligido. Si el objetivo supera una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, Keykeross le inflige daño mental igual al 50 % de sus heridas máximas. Si el objetivo falla la prueba, Keykeross le inflige daño mental igual al 90 % de sus heridas máximas y el objetivo sufre el {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efecto negativo{/g} truco sucio.

languages.text: Wenn Keykeross mehr als 50 % ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} verliert, greift sie einmal pro Kampf eine Kreatur an und regeneriert Wunden entsprechend des von ihr verursachten {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g}. Besteht das Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeits{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g}, fügt Keykeross dem Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g} entsprechend 50 % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Zieles zu. Besteht das Ziel die Probe nicht, fügt Keykeross dem Ziel Mentalschaden entsprechend 90 % der maximalen Wunden des Zieles zu und das Ziel erhält den {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekt{/g} Gemeiner Trick.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, when Keykeross loses more than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, she attacks a creature and restores wounds equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} she dealt. If the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, Keykeross deals {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to the target equal to 50% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. If the target fails the test, Keykeross deals mental damage to the target equal to 90% of the target's maximum wounds, and the target gains the dirty trick {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn Keykeross mehr als 50 % ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} verliert, greift sie einmal pro Kampf eine Kreatur an und regeneriert Wunden entsprechend des von ihr verursachten Schadens.Besteht das Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeits{/g}-Widerstands{g|Encyclopedia:Test}probe{/g}, fügt Keykeross dem Ziel Mentalschaden entsprechend 50 % der maximalen Wunden des Zieles zu. Besteht das Ziel die Probe nicht, fügt Keykeross dem Ziel Mentalschaden entsprechend 90 % der maximalen Wunden des Zieles zu und das Ziel erhält den {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negativen Effekt{/g} Gemeiner Trick.

languages.text: Une fois par combat, lorsque Keykeross perd plus de 50 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}, elle attaque une créature et lui restitue un nombre de blessures égal aux {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} qu'elle lui a infligés. Si la cible réussit un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, Keykeross lui inflige un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g} égal à 50 % de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} de la cible. Si la cible échoue au test, Keykeross lui inflige un nombre de points de dégâts mentaux égal à 90 % de sa réserve de blessures maximum, et la cible subit l'{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effet négatif{/g} Sale coup.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, when Keykeross loses more than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, she attacks a creature and restores wounds equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} she dealt. If the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, Keykeross deals {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to the target equal to 50% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. If the target fails the test, Keykeross deals mental damage to the target equal to 90% of the target's maximum wounds, and the target gains the dirty trick {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Une fois par combat, lorsque Keykeross perd plus de 50 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}, elle attaque une créature et lui restitue un nombre de blessures égal aux dégâts qu'elle lui a infligés. Si la cible réussit un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}, Keykeross lui inflige un nombre de points de dégâts mentaux égal à 50 % de sa réserve de blessures maximum. Si la cible échoue au test, Keykeross lui inflige un nombre de points de dégâts mentaux égal à 90 % de sa réserve de blessures maximum, et la cible subit l'{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effet négatif{/g} Sale Coup.

languages.text: Keykeross, %50'den fazla {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı kaybettiğinde çatışmada bir kez bir yaratığa saldırarak verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} sağlık puanını tazeler. Hedef, bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçerse Keykeross, ona hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %50'si kadar {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}zihinsel hasar{/g} verir. Hedef, testi geçemezse Keykeross, ona hedefin maksimum sağlık puanının %90'ı kadar zihinsel hasar verir ve hedef, pis numara {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}olumsuz etkisine{/g} maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, when Keykeross loses more than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, she attacks a creature and restores wounds equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} she dealt. If the target passes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, Keykeross deals {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to the target equal to 50% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. If the target fails the test, Keykeross deals mental damage to the target equal to 90% of the target's maximum wounds, and the target gains the dirty trick {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}.
